description: Powerful low-end and high-end to support big drums, fuzzed bass, and clear vocals/synths, with a focus on cutting presence.

bands.notes: Moderate boost for sub-bass power and the physical feel of a stadium rock band.
Strong boost for kick drum thump and the deep foundation of the bassline.
Small boost for low-end body and richness in the bass guitar and low piano notes.
Slight cut to clean up the low-mids and prevent the fuzzed bass/guitar from sounding overly muddy.
Mid-range scoop to add clarity and separation, emphasizing the extremes (bass and high-mids/treble).
Small boost to give the rhythm guitar/bass melodic lines more definition.
Moderate boost for vocal presence, intelligibility, and the cutting edge of distorted guitars.
Strong boost for high-end attack, cymbal definition, and the distinctive texture of Matt Bellamy's highly-processed guitar tone.
Moderate boost for high-frequency sparkle, synths, and the 'air' around the epic soundscape.
Small boost for overall brightness and sonic extension.
